about_the_game:
The world is about to get cooked. In a city where the paranormal's just another part of the daily grind, there's a guy... Howard... Detective. His latest gig? A real mind-bender. Word on the street is that the world’s about to get a front-row seat to an alien invasion. Not the little green men, these guys are nastier and packing a lot more hardware. The kind that doesn’t just probe you—they ANNIHILATE you.

Dive headfirst into the chaos and uncover a plot so thick you could slice it with a Bowie knife. Travel through the universe and score the ultimate prize: the “Titan Core”. With every twist and turn, every near miss and close call, you’re not just fighting for survival—you’re playing the heist of the century.

Explore the world of Planet-0, grab a drink at the Crow Jazz Bar, Besiege the ASTRAL SANCTUM and find your way to the HIV3. Along your wild ride, forge alliances, battle sinister cyborgs, and navigate a labyrinth of emotions.

But in this cosmic mosh pit, there's only one burning question: What's the game plan for the universe's most kickass weapon?

Your choices build character. Your character builds choices.

Combine skills to morph existing obnoxiousness into new, even more outrageous forms. Make your choices and weave the story with different skill combinations.

Every critical decision hinges on the roll of an eight-sided die, with success or failure branching the narrative in unpredictable directions.

Celestial Return smashes together an art style that's as unique as it is stunning, mashing up Japanese manga flair with the raw energy of American comics. The hand-drawn graphics vividly capture the personalities and settings of the characters, ripping pages from legends like Blame!, Biomega, Akira, and Berserk. Our artistry aims to evoke the same depth and intensity that made these series iconic.

TONS OF WORDS

Whatever you hope to find, you’ll find even more. The W0RK is massive, The W0RK is true.

With extensive gritty, emotional dialogue and text, you’re thrust into a cybernetic chaos. As you tear through the game, you'll be making decisions, building relationships, and twisting the plot. Jump in and see how your choices flip the lives of every character you cross.

3 LIFETIMES, 3 FOOLS

Play the storyline from the EYESIGHTs of 3 unique characters with a vast background. A talking rose, a paranormal anomaly detective and a sparkbot with half the height and double the drive. Take over the roles of the different protagonists and experience a world on the brink of chaos through their eyes. Each of them has their own desires, anxieties and preferred ways of dying.

FULL SOUNDTRACK SUITE

Gear up for the ultimate auditory experience with a full soundtrack suite that's packed with bangers! Noir Jazz, Cyberpunk Techno, Death Metal. Bleed your ears, bleed your heart.
